outputs.output_descr: The objective of this Project Preparation Grant (PPG) is to develop a medium-sized project document for a UNDP/GEF project in Climate Change focal area promoting energy efficiency and low-carbon technologies in the Russian Federation by greening Sochi 2014 Olympic Games.

project_descr: Greening 2014 Sochi Olympics: A Strategy and Action Plan for the Greening Legacy:  preparatory grant
